edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.shared
Interface RefractoryPeriod

All Known Subinterfaces:
AttentionCodelet, GlobalWorkspace
All Known Implementing Classes:
AttentionCodeletImpl, BasicAttentionCodelet, GlobalWorkspaceImpl, MockAttentionCodeletImpl, MockAttentionCodeletImpl, MockGlobalWorkspaceImpl, NeighborhoodAttentionCodelet
public interface RefractoryPeriod

Implementors of this interface can have a refractory period. The unit of the time period is in ticks, the unit of time in the framework.

Author:
Ryan J. McCall
See Also:
TaskManager
